sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function DistrictInfo({ selectedDistrict, districtData, candidateData, electionData }) { if (!selectedDistrict) { return (

Select a district to view detailed information

); } return (
{/* District Information */}

District {selectedDistrict}

Population: {districtData?.Population?.toLocaleString() || 'N/A'}
Last Updated: {districtData?.Last_Updated ? new Date(districtData.Last_Updated).toLocaleDateString() : 'N/A'}
{/* Candidates Information */}

Current Candidates

{candidateData && candidateData.length > 0 ? (
{candidateData.map((candidate) => (
{candidate.Image_URL && ( )}

{candidate.Name}

{candidate.Party} {candidate.Incumbent && ( Incumbent )}
{candidate.Biography && (

{candidate.Biography}

)}
{candidate.Website && (
Website: {candidate.Website}
)} {candidate.Contact_Info && (
Contact: {candidate.Contact_Info}
)}
))}
) : (

No candidates found for this district

)}
{/* Election Information */}

Election Details

Election Date: {electionData?.Election_Date ? new Date(electionData.Election_Date).toLocaleDateString() : 'N/A'}
Registration Deadline: {electionData?.Registration_Deadline ? new Date(electionData.Registration_Deadline).toLocaleDateString() : 'N/A'}
Early Voting Period: {electionData?.Early_Voting_Start && electionData?.Early_Voting_End ? `${new Date(electionData.Early_Voting_Start).toLocaleDateString()} - ${new Date(electionData.Early_Voting_End).toLocaleDateString()}` : 'N/A'}
); } export default DistrictInfo;
